about_the_game:
Have we got a surprise for you?

Well, yes, as it happens. We’ve got a free costume for you! Would you like to dress your staff as zombies? Ask no more, it’s happening. Your dreams, our schemes.



This beautiful zombie costume is just one of the many items included in the full Fancy Dress Pack, available to buy right now.
